com.eis.greenenergy.help

Class NotificationPublisher

  • java.lang.Object
    • BroadcastReceiver
      • com.eis.greenenergy.help.NotificationPublisher

  • public class NotificationPublisher
extends BroadcastReceiver
    Auxiliary class to push the notification once it is alerted by the AlarmManager.
    As every instance of this class is a receiver of broadcasts, it was registered as such in AndroidManifest.xml.
    Since:
    2014-08-25
    Version:
    1.3
    Author:
    Veronika Henk, Sarvenaz Golchin, Mahnaz Hajibaba

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      static java.lang.String NOTIFICATION_ID
      Id of the notification to be displayed to the user.
      static java.lang.String NOTIFICATIONBUILDER
      Builder which is necessary to push the notification.
      static java.lang.String NOTIFICATIONSCORE
      Amount which is added to the user's score when the notification is displayed.

    • Method Detail

      • onReceive

        public void onReceive(Context context,
             Intent intent)
        Is called when an instance of this class receives an intent sent by sendBroadcast().
        The notification created earlier is now accessed and pushed. In other words, this notification is now displayed to the user.
        Also, if the predicted green energy amount is above 27%, the user's score is increased.
        Parameters:
        context - Context of the application to enable the initiation of an instance of NotificationManager.
        intent - Intent, which contains the notification itself and was sent from the method createNotification.
